fr.inria.atlanmod.mogwai.neoemf.util

Class NeoEMFQueryHandler

  • Object
    • NeoEMFQueryHandler

  • public class NeoEMFQueryHandler
extends Object
    The query handler used in Mogwai resources to compute MogwaiQuery on top of NeoEMF resources.

    This class provides a simple API that accepts MogwaiQuery instances and delegate their computation to the appropriated NeoEMFQueryProcessor.

    MogwaiQuery execution options are filled with default values optimized for the model mapping used in NeoEMF graph.

    This class is thread-safe and avoids query execution concurrency issues by allowing only one computation per processor at a time.

    Author:
    Gwendal DANIEL

      • query

        public NeoEMFQueryResult query(MogwaiQuery query,
                               Object arguments,
                               BlueprintsPersistenceBackend datastore,
                               Map<String,Object> options)
                        throws QueryException
        Computes the provided query with the given arguments on datastore.

        TODO handle OCL query arguments (self, free variables).

        Parameters:
        query - the MogwaiQuery to compute
        arguments - the optional arguments of the MogwaiQuery to compute
        datastore - the BlueprintsPersistenceBackend to compute the query on
        options - the Map containing query execution options
        Returns:
        a NeoEMFQueryResult wrapping the output of the executed query and allowing EObjects reification
        Throws:
        QueryException - if the handler cannot find a processor for the provided query
        See Also:
        NeoEMFGremlinQueryProcessor, NeoEMFOCLQueryProcessor

      • transform

        public NeoEMFQueryResult transform(MogwaiQuery transformation,
                                   BlueprintsPersistenceBackend datastore,
                                   Map<String,Object> options)
                            throws QueryException
        Computes the provided model transformation on datastore.
        Parameters:
        transformation - the MogwaiQuery representing the transformation to compute
        datastore - the BlueprintsPersistenceBackend to compute the transformation on
        options - a Map containing transformation execution options
        Returns:
        a NeoEMFQueryResult wrapping the output of the executed transformation and allowing EObjects reification
        Throws:
        QueryException - if the handler cannot find a processor for the provided transformation
        See Also:
        NeoEMFATLQueryProcessor
